title: Better Soil Structure Better Planting: a Series with Kent Vlieger (1/7)

tasks.task: Watch and evaluate soil health management practices in South Dakota fields after heavy precipitation.
subtasks: Observe farmer Kent Vlieger discussing the context of the videos.
Understand the 2019 conditions that led to high precipitation and delays in planting.
Note the anxiety surrounding the 2020 planting season due to moisture concerns.
Identify the goal of the eight videos: showcasing producers' experiences with soil health practices.
Recognize the variety of producers featured, from long-term implementers to those with shorter experience.
Expect to see examples of both successful handling of moisture and challenges faced in planting.

tasks.task: Plan a video shoot for a soil health series.
subtasks: Research and select producers with diverse soil health practices.
Schedule filming sessions in affected fields.
Coordinate with farmers to assess planting conditions.

tasks.task: Implement soil health techniques to manage excess moisture.
subtasks: Adjust planting dates to avoid wet conditions.

tasks.task: Evaluate the impact of long-term versus short-term soil health practices.
Watch the video series on South Dakota soil health practices.
subtasks: Note how producers managed excess moisture in 2020.

tasks.task: Research and prepare to watch a video series on soil health practices.
Adapt farming practices in response to weather conditions.
subtasks: Evaluate the effectiveness of current soil management techniques.

tasks.task: Identify soil health practices to manage excess moisture.
subtasks: Consider no-till vs. conventional tillage methods.

tasks.task: Educate others on South Dakota's 2020 soil health practices.
Execute a soil health practice intended to manage moisture in heavy rainfall areas (as an existing practice in South Dakota).
Plan a farm video series focusing on soil health practices.
subtasks: Research farmers with diverse soil health experience.
Schedule field visits for video production.
Coordinate with farmers to film during planting seasons.

tasks.task: Analyze the effects of soil health practices on crop resilience.
